reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup:** Goon LP, dual parallel 25g SS316L @0.1 ohms, 100w, full cotton wicks

**Testing:**[Liquid Nicotine Wholesalers Grape](https://liquidnicotinewholesalers.com/lnw-grape.html) @5% steeped three days

**Flavor Description:** Somewhere between sugary grape Kool-aid and grape Pez candy. This tastes very sweet throughout. This has that same chalkiness that the pineapple does. The grape flavor is pretty much an artificial, candy type grape. 

**Off-flavors:** Chalkiness. I want to clarify that it's not off-putting. This is just not a realistic grape taste.

**Throat hit:** A little dry.

**Uses & Pairings:** Grape drank, Grape soda (actually this has great grape soda potential), Grape candy, Grapey stuff of all kinds. just keep this away from anywhere you want a realistic grape.

**Notes:** It is starting to look like the "fruit" flavors from LNW are fruit flavored candy concentrates. I still have a tester of blueberry to try though. I want to make it clear that that is not necessarily a bad thing. If you like candy profiles these will be worth picking up.

**Second Opinions:** Nothing yet!
reviewsJson.author: PerennialPhilosopher
reviewsJson.title: Grape
